main event: A military witness sighted a large 'flying saucer' over Ft. Myers, Florida.
interesting points: The saucer was reported to have glowing areas on its leading edge and appeared round or elliptical in shape.,The object was traveling at about 500 feet altitude and had a metallic glowing edge.,The witnessed claimed no discernible means of propulsion for the object.,The flying saucer disappeared to the northwest at a speed faster than any airplane.,The witness was a U.S. airplane purchasing agent during World War II.
sighted object: a large flying saucer with glowing areas
witness description: U.S. airplane purchasing agent during World War II
